# NSControl.ImagePosition

**Enumeration**

A constant for specifying the position of a button’s image relative to its title.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ImagePosition
```

## Overview

Use these constants with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSButton/imagePosition] property of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSButton] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSButtonCell].

## Positioning a Control’s Image

- **NSControl.ImagePosition.noImage**: The cell doesn’t display an image.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageOnly**: The cell displays an image but not a title.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageLeading**: The image is on the title’s leading edge.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageTrailing**: The image is on the title’s trailing edge.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageLeft**: The image is to the left of the title.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageRight**: The image is to the right of the title.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageBelow**: The image is below the title.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageAbove**: The image is above the title.
- **NSControl.ImagePosition.imageOverlaps**: The image overlaps the title.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring button images

- **image**: The image that appears on the button when it’s in an off state, or `nil` if there is no such image.
- **alternateImage**: An alternate image that appears on the button when the button is in an on state.
- **imagePosition**: The position of the button’s image relative to its title.
- **isBordered**: A Boolean value that determines whether the button has a border.
- **isTransparent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the button is transparent.
- **bezelStyle**: The appearance of the button’s border.
- **bezelColor**: The color of the button’s bezel, in appearances that support it.
- **showsBorderOnlyWhileMouseInside**: A Boolean value that determines whether the button displays its border only when the pointer is over it.
- **imageHugsTitle**: A Boolean value that determines how the button’s image and title are positioned together within the button bezel.
- **imageScaling**: The scaling mode applied to make the cell’s image fit the frame of the image view.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
